updateDirectorDetailsTitle: View and update the director's details
updateDirectorDetailsHint: If you need to tell us about more than one update, and they happened on different dates, you must submit them separately.
updateDirectorDetailsInsetText: Any updates you make to a director's details are pending until you’ve submitted this filing, and we’ve accepted it.
updateDirectorDetailsCorrespondenceAddre: The correspondence address is the same as the registered office address
updateDirectorDetailsHomeAddressSameAsCo: The home address is the same as the correspondence address
